aBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

ant.aBody:
Fulgebunt iusti et tamquam scintillae in arundineto discurrent Fulgebunt iusti et tamquam stille in arundineto discurrent iudicabunt nationes
et regnabunt in aeternum et vivent in aeternum et regnabunt in aeternum alleluia
